snippet.title: Starfighter: Eclipse Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Music by Ashesborn - https://soundcloud.com/ashesborn
Video by  Thisbe

Buy Starfighter: Eclipse at: https://www.datenighto.com

Starfighter: Eclipse, the visual novel based on popular adult webcomic Starfighter by HamletMachine, is now available for purchase. The first official game release by Date Nighto, Starfighter: Eclipse features a new story set in an 1980s-inspired science fiction universe, with male/male sexual relationships for the player to pursue and all new characters and art in the webcomic’s distinctive style. 

Join Helios, the newest Fighter on the starship Kepler, as he and his crewmates investigate a derelict alien ship. Starfighter: Eclipse offers multiple romance options, plot routes, and endings as you navigate the difficult politics and relationships aboard the Kepler. 

Starfighter: Eclipse is built on Date Nighto’s proprietary htmlVN technology, which brings visual novels to all modern browsers on your PC, tablet, or smartphone.
